text.section: There is an Executive Committee created to provide oversight in the development of the State of Maryland's plans for dredged material management.

section.section:
The Governor shall invite the following people to serve as members of the Executive Committee:
A representative of the Army Corps of Engineers, Philadelphia District; and
A representative of the Army Corps of Engineers, Baltimore District.

text.section: The Executive Committee shall meet as needed, but not less than semiannually.
